hero.title: Healthy Eating for Our Community
hero.subtitle: Discover culturally-adapted DASH diet recipes and guidelines tailored for the diverse Elmhurst community. Better health starts with food that feels like home.

culturallyAdapted.title: Culturally Adapted
culturallyAdapted.description: Recipes and recommendations tailored to your cultural preferences and traditions

multiLanguage.title: Multiple Languages
multiLanguage.description: Content available in English, Chinese, Spanish, Korean, and Bengali

easyToFollow.title: Easy to Follow
easyToFollow.description: Simple, clear instructions and shopping lists to help you succeed
